==Useful Info==
[[Hellwing]]s are pesky [[tier-4 demon]]s with average melee combat skills and decent regeneration. They can make swooping attacks in range-4: when swooping, they land on the opposite side of a target, and instantly make a melee attack. They are found in [[the Abyss]] and [[Pandemonium]], and are often summoned by other monsters through the [[Summon Demon]] spell.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Unless you find a hellwing particularly early (mid-Dungeon, Lair), they usually don't pose much of a melee threat. The bigger threat is the hellwing appearing from behind, blocking your escape path.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], hellwings had fast regeneration.
*Prior to [[0.28]], hellwings could spawn in the [[Hell]]s.
*Prior to [[0.19]], hellwings had the [[Cigotuvi's Embrace (spell)|Cigotuvi's Embrace]] spell and were vulnerable to [[silver]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], they didn't have the swoop attack formerly possessed by [[blue devil]]s.
*Prior to [[0.17]], hellwings had [[Teleport Self]] and [[Teleport Other]].
*Prior to [[0.16]], they couldn't cast Cigotuvi's Embrace.
*Prior to [[0.12]], player-summoned hellwings could be used to gain permanent undead allies.
*Prior to [[0.6]], hellwings were [[tier-3 demon]]s.
